name: C_ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT_PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE
description: Combination table joining ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT and PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE

partitions.name: C_ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT_PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE
